ISSUE.TITLE: Add advertised host name support
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Consumers return absolute URIs, so we should have a config to control the host name used in this URI since it can't always be determined correctly automatically. To stay consistent with schema-registry, the option should be "host.name" rather than "advertised.host.name" as used by Kafka.
